description.displayText: We hired Laura to take care of our 6 month old little boy and she worked for us for over a year. We love her and consider her part of our family. She is so caring, gentle, respectful and knowledgeable for caring for babies and older kids. We also have an 8 year old that she played with when he was out of school. She really is an angel and I miss her! Laura has wonderful communication skills and is extremely dependable. I would re-hire her in a heartbeat if we ever had another child. She still babysits for us when we need care. Highly recommend her for any childcare!
description.originalText: We hired Laura to take care of our 6 month old little boy and she worked for us for over a year. We love her and consider her part of our family. She is so caring, gentle, respectful and knowledgeable for caring for babies and older kids. We also have an 8 year old that she played with when he was out of school. She really is an angel and I miss her! Laura has wonderful communication skills and is extremely dependable. I would re-hire her in a heartbeat if we ever had another child. She still babysits for us when we need care. Highly recommend her for any childcare!

description.displayText:
We could not have asked for a better nanny for our son. Laura was always punctual, reliable,
sweet, nurturing and responsible. She's an extremely quick learner and only needs to be asked
to do something once. Laura has the most gentle and loving disposition. She is so natural with
children, our son loved her immediately. I work from home and it was so comforting to hear my
little guy cooing and laughing with Laura in the other room. She sang to him, read him books,
helped him with tummy time, took him on walks, spoke to him in both English and Spanish, the
list goes on and on! One day, she walked to the library with our son and found a Baby Story
Time that she planned to take him to weekly. She truly was a dream come true.
As I mentioned, we did not know Laura for long but she truly touched our hearts. She is sweet,
loving, honest and polite. I would highly recommend Laura!

description.displayText: Laura was excellent with our 3 month old son. She was consistently engaging him by playing or reading to him. She is professional, kind and patient. I would definitely recommend her to families.
